personal.name: Dhruba Saha
personal.title: Full Stack Developer & AI Enthusiast
personal.shortBio: Adaptable and results-oriented developer with expertise in modern web technologies and AI/ML

bio.longDescription: I'm an adaptable and results-oriented individual with a strong work ethic and a proven ability to deliver high-impact solutions across diverse technical domains. Currently pursuing B.Tech in Robotics at Satyabama Institute of Science and Technology, I specialize in full-stack development, AI/ML, and modern web technologies. Quick to learn and comfortable taking ownership of complex tasks, with a focus on solving real-world problems and driving continuous improvement.
highlights: Expert in Python, Flask, React.js, and AI/ML technologies
Built intelligent systems for event management and smart farming
Certified in Data Analytics and Geospatial Technologies
Strong foundation in algorithms and data structures

seo.title: Dhruba Saha - Full Stack Developer & AI Enthusiast
seo.description: Full Stack Developer specializing in Python, React, AI/ML, and modern web technologies. Building intelligent solutions for real-world problems.
